isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) System - Clean, Inspect, and Test

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, wear safety glasses with side shields. Limit compressed air pressure to 207 kPa (30 psi).

svcproc.title: Clean and Inspect EGR System Components

step1.para: Clean gasket material and carbon deposits off exhaust side EGR cooler and exhaust manifold mating surfaces.
Clean gasket mating surfaces of EGR tube, intake side EGR cooler, EGR distribution tube, and EGR and inlet air mixer duct.
Clean gasket mating surfaces of EGR valve manifold assembly and remove carbon deposits.
Clean corrosion from ends of all EGR system coolant pipes and hoses.
Clean EGR coolant supply port in the back of the front cover assembly and clean coolant return port in the intake side of the cylinder head.
Inspect all EGR system components for cracks, leaks, and damage. Replace damaged parts.
